Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes
The scene cuts to a mangled cadaver
Holly’s head unnaturally drops from her shoulders and dangles in front of the car window
The demon grabs Rose’s face and proceeds to scream
The doctor knocks on Rose’s car window, startling her
The camera cuts back to the doctor who is now replaced by a smiling Carl with blood dripping from his mouth
Rose’s mother yells her name
The demon grabs the door that Rose is trying to close
The demon appears behind Rose and throws her against the wall
Joel begins running at Rose with an associated loud sound effect
Rose turns to see she is back at her childhood home

movies.title: Spiral: From the Book of Saw

jump_scares.spoiler: The camera cuts back from the mannequin to the cop to reveal a man in a pig mask who suddenly attacks him
Fitch quickly removes the cloak to reveal a pig mask underneath
As Fitch is walking away, he is jumped by the man in the pig mask
After showing the spiral for a few seconds, there is a loud glitch sound and the video cuts away to a pig doll
Zeke opens the car door and a dead pig falls out, startling him
The camera pans around the room to reveal the man in the pig mask in front of Angie
There is a sudden loud cut from Zeke sitting in his car to him screaming
As Zeke walks out the door, he is attacked by the man in the pig mask
Marcus turns back around and is jumped by the man in the pig mask
The little girl suddenly turns around with blood all over her
Because Sissy is lost in her thoughts, she hits a kangaroo with the car
Sissy stares at the creepy painting and therefore gets scared by Alex coming in
Alex grabs the phone and looks around as she discovers the dead body of Jamie in the grass
Sissy starts hitting herself with her phone
After removing a few towels from under the bed, Emma finds Tracey’s corpse
While Emma is trying to process what happened, Sissy appears in the door behind her
The disfigured woman suddenly attacks the TV host
Tara backs into a woman standing behind her
After standing motionless for several seconds, the clown suddenly runs after Tara
Accompanied by a sound effect, the clown suddenly looks towards where Tara is hiding
The clown stabs Tara in the leg
After Tara yells “Mister!”, the clown grabs her from behind
The clown lifts the hammer and lunges at Tara causing her to flinch
The clown again lunges at Tara with the hammer
The pest exterminator turns around and almost walks into a woman standing behind him
The clown (disguised as Tara), suddenly sits up behind Vicky
The clown appears in front of the peep hole that Vicky is looking through
During a tense scene, a mop falls out of a bucket creating a loud noise
The clown suddenly places some plastic wrap over Vicky’s face
There is a sudden cut to Tara’s mutilated corpse
The clown appears through a door and attacks the pest exterminator
The clown reaches through a gap in the doors to grab Vicky
There is a loud noise and the lights start to flicker
The clown grabs the coroner by the neck
Some viewers might be startled at two stabbings at this point
Woman says “talk to me” and turns to see a man in front of her
Woman says “talk to me” again and a woman appears in front of her
Woman barks like a dog suddenly
Man says “I let you in” and head tilts backwards
Boy bites girl in the hand
Some viewers might be startled at man lunging at woman

movies.title: Stay Out Of The F**king Attic

jump_scares.spoiler: A hand hits the floor and a scream is heard
As they open the door a box falls down
The sudden click and flash of a camera during a quiet scene may startle some viewers
There is an abrupt scene change to the autopsy room where loud music is playing
A girl jumps on Austin from behind (as a joke)
Tommy rings the bell on the corpse’s foot to scare Emma
Something moves inside the ventilation duct causing Austin to fall backwards
Austin looks underneath the door and sees a foot come into view
There is a loud bang on the door
Something pulls Tommy away and the door slams shut
Austin looks through the hole in the door and sees a decomposed face with eyes and mouth stitched shut
Tommy looks around and sees a face come out of the fog at him
There is another loud bang on the door
Austin turns around and Tommy is standing directly behind him
A basketball hits Cole in the head as the title credits show on the screen
The camera pans around to reveal Bee watching Cole as he attempts to jump out the window
Cole backs into Sam’s corpse
Sonya slams her fist into some couragated iron near where Cole is hiding
Max is suddenly behind Cole
There is a loud sound effect as Cole bumps into something (but it’s only a potplant)
Alison grabs Cole around the leg
Alison is suddenly shot in the head (with gory results)
Larry looks inside a window and sees a white-eyed woman
A telephone rings
A hand reaches out through a dissolving hole in a wall, and attacks Joe
The camera zooms in on Martha, and immediately after the camera switches over on a decomposing corpse, floating on the surface in some water
The camera switches over to the white-eyed woman
As Mary-Ann begins to scream, the Camera zooms in on her
Jill turns around and sees two corpses
Jill opens a door and runs into a one-eyed zombie
Jill opens her eyes and reveals that her eyes are now white
As Emily puts her hands on a painting, a bell suddenly stars ringing
when Emily takes her hands off the painting, she sees that her hands are bleeding
After entering room 36, Liza opens the bathroom door, and sees Schweick’s corpse nailed on the wall
Liza looks through a window, and the camera suddenly shifts and zooms in on the book of Eibon
As martin looks through a book, a unseen force knocks him off the ladder
Martha discovers a re-animated Joe in the bathtub, that attacks her
The camera shifts over on a piano, that suddenly starts playing
Emily ducks her head down, and a zombie is standing behind her
A Zombie appears in front of the screen
Emily is crawling as the camera movers upwards to reveal another zombie
Dickie (the dog) turns around, and brutally kills Emily
Liza is suddenly attacked by the re-animated hotel worker
A unseen force suddenly hits Liza and John with thunderstorm, and blood starts dripping down on them
A zombie smashes through the window, and attacks Liza
The glass in a door suddenly breaks, and Dr. Harris is impaled by the glass splinter
A zombie leaps up, and attacks Liza
John opens a door, and sees a zombie slowly walking towards him and Liza
Jill suddenly attack Liza
As Emily stops to catch her breath, Randall suddenly taps her on the shoulder, startling her
An old woman appears from under the sheets
A man jumps out from behind a wall
Dark arms protrude from the mirror
A bang comes from the wardrobe
Tommy suddenly combusts
Possessed Lane shakes and makes a loud noise
A second bang comes from the wardrobe
A rat jumps out from behind a box
Possessed Lane turns and looks at Max
A hand touches Max’s shoulder
A demon grabs  Chris’s leg from under the toilet stall
A demon jumps towards the camera
A third bang comes from the wardrobe
Possessed Lane suddenly looks up
Scene cut to stuffed pig with snort sound
Mom walks away revealing a figure behind her (no sound
Door shuts
Bloody face appears with loud sound
Woman turns into a bloody face
Kid jumps out to scare the other kids
A teen hold a jar with a spider in it. The jar suddenly breaks
Door opens with Credence standing there accompanied by a loud sound effect
Dominic appears behind the girls and grabs them as they scream
A bloody woman smashes against the car window
A dog runs out of dark hole
A camouflage crawler screams at Sarah
A crawler suddenly apears next the the thermal camera
The camera pans to the left exposing a crawler
Sarah grabs Rios from behind
Dan is attacked by a crawler
A crawler appears through a hole in the rocks
A flashlight startles Cath and Greg
A human hand drops from the roof
A crawler attacks Greg
A crawler attacks Cath
Sarah touches Rios shoulder
A crawler jumps towards Vaines
A crawler jumps out from under the water
A crawler jumps out from under the water a second time
Juno comes into camera view and screams
A hand grabs Juno
Rios gets hit with a shovel
A crawler jumps out of the hole towards the camera
There is an explosion from the wreckage of the aircraft
A spear pierces through Kara’s neck
One of the tribesmen grabs Justine around the leg
Justine has a dream where she bites Alejandro on the neck after he returns from the jungle
Buzz bumps into a beam in the dark looking for an exit
A hand reached out under the Funhouse bunting and grabs Joey
The Funhouse electricity kicks on causing the animatronic monsters to move and the loud thunder and lightning sound effects to turn on
A skeleton leaps out of the floor and a rope drops around Richie’s neck
Liz falls screaming through a trap door
As Buzz attempts to comfort Amy, the monster-son falls between them and attacks Amy
The father, impaled on the sword grabs Buzz
Amy is started by the monster-son lurking amongst the Funhouse animatronic characters
The monster breaks through a locked door
A piece of equipment falls from the upper mechanical deck
A wooden ladder slam onto the floor in front of Amy
Even with the power cut, The Fat Lady starts moving and cackling and surprises Amy
The sound of steam releasing from a pump startles Liz

In an homage to both John Carpenter’s classic Halloween (1978) and Hitchcock’s Psycho (1960) young Joey sneaks into the bathroom dressed as a maniacal clown, rips back the shower curtain, raises a knife, and surprises his horrified sister
The son of the carny tears his Frankenstein mask off revealing his disfigured face
Joey is startled by a menacing dog
A magician scares the audience when an volunteer from the audience steps into The Impaler and gets a stake hammered into the her heart
A creepy man offers Joey a ride then unexpectedly points a shotgun at him
The man touches an animatronic corpse, which suddenly goes off and begins to flail around
One of the funhouse workers turns around a corner and is grabbed by the Rocco the clown
The lights go off, causing the group of girls to scream
As the camera is panning, Dr. Suave jumps out from behind a corner
Mikey and Randall approach a window and Dollface slams a girl against it from the other side
A woman runs up to the car and begins to bang on the window
A funhouse worker jumps out at Laurie and the injured man while they are walking through a hallway
Post credits scene – As the camera pans over several body bags, one of them springs up
Brent is grabbed by Lola from behind while looking down the hole
Lola’s scrapbook flies at the windshield while Holly is driving
While the camera slowly zooms in on Lola there is a cut to the car right in front of her when they collide
The kid takes a picture, and the flash reveals an old man standing on the other side of the door looking directly at him
As Sam puts her ear against the coffin, there is suddenly a mechanical sound that startles her
Carol suddenly grabs Wendell on the arm
Carol suddenly gets up and screams at Wendell as the saw touches her leg
Wendell reaches for the box and the elevator suddenly begins to fall down
As the camera zooms in on Wendell’s face there is a flash of Carol’s ghost screaming at the camera
In the horror movie Sam is watching on TV, a girl begins to call out “hello?” while looking out of the shower and is grabbed by her boyfriend scaring her as a joke
Sam turns around and the bloody man is standing right in front of her
A hand suddenly reaches out of the burning book very fast
As Lizzie sits on a bed nursing her amputated arm, we get 3 short sharp flash backs to Lizzie screaming which may startle some sensitive viewers
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
With very little warning, Leatherface comes out of the record vault after Choptop points it out
Leatherface crashes through the door behind LG
Leatherface breaks through the wall behind Stretch
Sudden chainsaw noises up ahead startle Stretch
Leatherface bursts out of the tunnel in front of Stretch
Stretch is grabbed from above by Choptop
A reporter walks down a dark hallway and is hit by a stick held by someone off-screen
Alison lifts up a can of bug spray to reveal Dale standing behind it watching her
Chloe puts her hand on Alison’s shoulder
An unseen person appears in camera shot, ambushing the woman hiding behind the tree trunk
Chad taps on the car door and yells out (as a joke) which startles Alison
Chloe jumps out in front of the cop car
There are several loud gunshots
Chad ambushes Tucker who is attempting to hide behind a tree trunk
Dale looks up and sees Mitch impaled on the tree
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
The ice cream truck quickly drives in from the side and runs over a cop
There is a sudden loud shriek and the woman on the bed is flung to the side
Demonic hands suddenly appear out of the cape and grab Scarlett
The door to the gate suddenly flies upwards by itself
The cameraman suddenly screams as a bone cracking sound is heard, followed by him turning back to the woman who rips his arm out
The camera suddenly shatters as the cameraman is stabbed
A cloud of dust shoots out of the sewer gate as a growl is heard
While the camera is lying on the ground, a cloud of dust shoots into screen from the side after a few seconds
The ice cream truck suddenly begins blasting music which startles Kev
An eye appears in the man’s belongings
A man appears in front of the camera
Banging from the coffin knocks things over
Mr. Edwards turns around
Hayley looks around with the camera and a severed hand moving around on its own causes her to scream
Hayley looks up from the ground and Mr. Edwards is running straight at her
One of the soldiers reaches out for the woman who quickly grabs him on the arm
There is a sudden loud noise during a quiet scene as someone gets attacked in another room
The police officer appears behind her
The subject runs into frame and rams into the soldier from the side
A strange creature eats a man’s face
The creature reappears
The running woman stops to catch her breath, and as the camera begins to spin around her she is suddenly hit with a club
Nacho jumps out from behind a door as a joke
A club suddenly breaks the front window of the car
The killer drops down to the ground and looks at Vasco
A car’s headlights suddenly turn on in the background
(-1:11:10) A quiet scene suddenly cuts to a loud ventilator
(-1:05:14) A hand suddenly comes out of the hole in the decapitated head
(-45:04) As Will opens the cupboard a cockroach flies out
(-44:02)  The man at the table suddenly spits out blood
(-33:45) The creature jumps at the camera
(-30:49) As Will enters the bedroom he sees a mask accompanied by a sound effect
A police officer is shot through the back of a car while driving. Although telegraphed, the impact is rather sudden
While a man is driving, there is a sudden cut to Katarina on the road accompanied by a sound cue
A seemingly dead woman suddenly springs back up from behind Paul and screeches
A snake snaps at Darius as he reaches into the hole
Darius is grabbed from above
Two masked members appear in the shadows
Jen is grabbed by Darius

Jen is attacked
